maqras.text: 70|19|Ningen wa hontoni sewashinaku tsukura rete iru.
70|20|Saiyaku ni aeba nageki kanashimi,
70|21|koun ni aeba monooshimi ni naru.
70|22|Daga reihai ni shojin suru mono wa,-sode wanai.
70|23|Reihai o genshu shite iru mono,
70|24|mata kare-ra no tomi ga, koseidearu to mitome rarete iru mono,
70|25|monogoi suru mono ya taibo suru mono no tame ni (hodokosu mono),
70|26|mata shinpan no hi no shinjitsu o kakunin shite iru mono,
70|27|mata kare-ra no omo no chobatsu o osoreru mono mo.
70|28|Hontoni omo no chobatsu kara, anzendearu to kangaerubekide wanai.
70|29|Mata kakureta tokoro (teisetsu) o mamoru mono,
70|30|kare-ra no tsuma ya migite no shoyu suru mono ni kagitte iru baai wa betsu de,-zai ni wa naranai.
70|31|Shikashi kore igai ni motomeru mono wa ho o koeta monodearu.
70|32|Futaku sa reta koto ya yakusoku ni chujitsuna-sha,
70|33|shogen ni koseina-sha,
70|34|mata reihai o genshu suru mono.
70|35|Korera no mono wa eiyo o ete rakuen no naka ni (sumu).
70|36|Ima fushinjin-sha-tachi ga, anata no kata ni isoide iru no wa nanigoto ka.
70|37|Migi kara mata hidarikara,-gun ni natte.
70|38|Kare-ra wa mina shifuku no rakuen ni hairu koto o nozomu no ka.
70|39|Iya, danjite dekinai kotodearu. Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra ga shiru mono kara, kare-ra o tsukutta nodearu.
70|40|Iya, ware wa azuma to nishi no omo ni yotte chikau. Ware ni totte wa kanodearu.
70|41|Kare-ra yori mo sugureta (soto no)-sha o motte, kare-ra ni kaete yarou. Ware wa, shippai suru koto wa nai nodearu.
70|42|Dakara anata wa, kare-ra o (kyoei ni) hitara se, tawamure ni makaseruga yoi. Kare-ra ga yakusoku sa rete iru, sonohi no kaiken made.
70|43|Kare-ra ga haka kara awatadashiku detekuru-bi. Sore wa marude (gense de) kare-ra ga guzo kami e to isoida yo ni.
70|44|Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o komurudearou. Kore ga kare-ra ni yakusoku sa rete ita, sonohidearu.
71|1|Hontoni ware wa, nufu o sono min ni tsukawashi,`itamashi chobatsu ga anata no min ni kudaru mae ni, anata wa, kare-ra ni keikoku shi nasai.'(To meijita).
71|2|Kare wa itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, watashi wa anata gata e no komeina 1-ri no keikoku-shadesu.
71|3|Anata gata wa arra ni tsukae, kare o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.

71|4|Kare wa anata gata no samazamana tsumi o yurushi, sadame rareta kigen made, anata gata o yuyo nasa remasu. Hontoni arra no kigen ga kita toki wa, yuyo sa remasen. Moshi anata gata ga wakatte itanaraba.'
71|5|Kare (nufu) wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, watashi wa yoru mo hiru mo, watashi no hitobito ni yobikakemashita.
71|6|Daga, watashi no yobikake wa, tada (seido kara no) tohi o masu bakaridesu.

71|7|Watashi ga kare-ra ni,“kare ga, anata gata o o yurushi ni naru noda” to yobikakeru toki, kare-ra wa yubi o jibun no mimi ni sashikomi, jibun de gaito o komutte (fushinjin o) koshu shi, hitasura koman ni narimasu.
71|8|Sorede watashi wa,-goe o okiku shite kare-ra ni yobikakemashita.
71|9|Arutoki wa ko ni, mata (arutoki wa) hisoka ni kare-ra ni (uttaete),
71|10|watashi wa iimashita. “Anata gata no omo no o yurushi o negae. Hontoni kare wa, tabitabi o yurushi nasa reru.
71|11|Kare wa, anata gata no ue ni yutaka ni ame o furase rare,
71|12|anata gata no zaisan ya shijo o fuyashi, mata anata gata no tame ni, samazamana en ya (mizu no nagareru) kasen o moke rareru.
71|13|Anata gata wa do shita no ka. Arra no goshinsetsu, gamandzuyo-sa ni taishite, nozomi o motanai to wa.
71|14|Kare wa hontoni junjoyoku dankai o o tte anata gata o tsukura reta.
71|15|Anata gata wa, arra ga 7 ten o ikaga ni isso mata isso to, tsukura reta ka o kangaete minakatta no ka.
71|16|Mata tsuki o sono Chu no akari to sa re, taiyo o (moeru) tomyo to nasa reta ka o.
71|17|Arra wa anata gata o tsuchi kara sodate rare,
71|18|sorekara, anata gata wa daichi ni kisa re, mata oki nobora se rareru.
71|19|Mata arra wa anata gata no tame ni, daichi o nobe hiroge rare,
71|20|sokode anata gata wa, hiroi daido o orai surudearou. ” To itte kika semashita.'
71|21|Nufu wa (sarani) itta. `Omo yo, kare-ra wa watashi ni shitagaimasen. Jibun no zaisan to shijo to de, hametsu o jocho suru mono ni dake shitagaimasu.
71|22|Soshite judaina sakubo o takuramimasu.
71|23|Kare-ra wa iimasu. “Anata gata no kamigami o suteru na. Waddo mo suwau mo, mata yagusu mo yauku mo nasuru mo, sutete wa naranai. ”
71|24|Kare-ra wa sudeni oku no mono o mayowa semashita. (Omo yo) mayoi o honin sa rete mo, fugi o okonau mono o oku shinaide kudasai.'
71|25|Kare-ra wa samazamana tsumi no tame ni obore sase rare, sarani hi goku ni okura re, arra no soto ni wa, don'na enjo-sha mo e rarenakatta.
71|26|Nufu wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, fushinjin'na kyoju-sha o darehitori to shite chijo ni nokosanaide kudasai.
71|27|Moshi anata ga kare-ra o nokosa rereba, kare-ra wa kanarazu anata ni tsukaeru mono o mayowa se, mata tsumiwookasu fushinjin'na mono no soto, umanaideshou.

71|28|Omo yo, watashi to watashi no ryoshin o o yurushi kudasai. Mata shinja to shite watashi no ie ni hairu mono, mata (subete no) shinko suru otoko to shinko suru on'na-tachi o o yurushi kudasai. Soshite fugi o okonau mono-tachi ni wa, metsubo no soto ni wa (nani mo) kuwaenaide kudasai.'
